Package org.opencastproject.metadata.mpeg7

Interface MultimediaContentType

All Superinterfaces:
org.opencastproject.mediapackage.XmlElement
All Known Subinterfaces:
Audio, AudioVisual, Video
All Known Implementing Classes:
MultimediaContentTypeImpl
public interface MultimediaContentType extends org.opencastproject.mediapackage.XmlElement
Base interface for either of AudioVisual, Audio or Video.

    • getMediaTime

      MediaTime getMediaTime()
      Returns the track's time constraints. Usually, the media time point will be T00:00:00, while the duration will reflect the duration of the whole video clip.
      Returns:
      the track's time constraints
